constructor.details: Initializes the transaction broadcaster like this: - If $ETH_FROM is defined, use it. - Otherwise, derive the broadcaster address from $MNEMONIC or a test default one. - If $USE_SOFTWARE_WALLET allows to not use an external hardware wallet, use the $ETH_FROM_PK private key. The use case is to specify the broadcaster via the command line.

documentation.text: @dev Included to enable compilation of the script without a $MNEMONIC environment variable.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "test test test test test test test test test test test junk"

value.value: test test test test test test test test test test test junk

documentation.text: @dev The address of the transaction broadcaster.
@dev The private key of the transaction broadcaster.
@dev Used to derive the broadcaster's address if $ETH_FROM is not defined.
@dev Used to determine if the script is running on the testnet.
@dev Used to determine if the transactions can be signed without using an external hardware wallet.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (string memory,string memory) view external returns (string memory)

documentation.text:
@dev Initializes the transaction broadcaster like this:
 - If $ETH_FROM is defined, use it.
 - Otherwise, derive the broadcaster address from $MNEMONIC or a test default one.
 - If $USE_SOFTWARE_WALLET allows to not use an external hardware wallet, use the $ETH_FROM_PK private key.
 The use case is to specify the broadcaster via the command line.
@notice Read an address from the environment.
@notice Read a private key from the environment.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string " address does not match the predicted address"

arguments.value: address does not match the predicted address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string " address does not match the predicted address"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string ": invalid code at this address"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string ": invalid code at this address"
